actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend Section 167 of the Water Resources Development Act of 1976, Public-Law 94-587, to extend by one year and increase the funding authority for the National Hydroelectric Power Resources Study.

summary.text: Amends the Water Resources Development Act of 1976 to extend by one year the national hydroelectric power resources study and to increase the funding authority for such study from $7,000,000 to $8,000,000.

titles.title: A bill to amend Section 167 of the Water Resources Development Act of 1976, Public-Law 94-587, to extend by one year and increase the funding authority for the National Hydroelectric Power Resources Study.
